item.title: Samba
item.description: I want to create shared folder that I can access from any device on my local network so I decided to try out Samba to get some experience. I'm mainly using this guide, but my notes will be a scaled down version. Ubuntu also has a great tutorial here Installation sudo apt install samba Verify Installation with: whereis samba Users and Groups We want to create a samba user and group and add our user to the group.
